name: 2ralbidva
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wb(w1, w2))

stmt.origin: ralbidva(s0, c0, w0, wral(s1, c1, w1), wral(s1, c1, w2))
stmt.pretty: ralbidva(s0, c0, w0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w1), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w2))

|- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(wral(s1, c1, w1), wral(s1, c1, w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

stmt.pretty: anassrs(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, (w1 ↔ w2))

comment: Formula-building rule for restricted universal quantifiers (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 4-Mar-1997.) Reduce dependencies on axioms. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 9-Dec-2019.)
